head.b:template-skin: body#layout #slide-item,body#layout #config{display:block!important;}body#layout{background-color: #000; margin: 0; padding: 10px;}body#layout div.section{border-radius: 10px; background: #204dcc; border: none; width: 94%;}body#layout .Blog .widget-content {height: 16em; border-radius: 10px;}body#layout #configuracoes{display:block; background: #002e42; color: #204dcc;}body#layout #configuracoes .widget-content{background: #00405b; color: #204dcc;}body#layout #configuracoes .widget-wrap2{display: contents;} body#layout:before{content:'Template Elétrico - Blogger Profissional';font-size:20px;color:#204dcc;text-align:center; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;} #menu-principal {padding: 0; height: auto;}.Local-dos-posts {width: auto; margin: 0; margin-top: 0;}#loading {display: none;}#config{opacity: 0.5;} body#layout .editlink {color: #fff !important;background: #204dcc;padding: 5px 15px;font-weight: bold;border-radius: 21px;right: 10px;} body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2 {background: #000!important;border-radius: 10px;} body#layout div.widget {border-radius: 10px;overflow: hidden;}body#layout .section h4 {color: #fff;} body#layout .add_widget {border: 2px dashed #000000;background: #5884ff;border-radius: 30px;} body#layout .add_widget a {color: #000000;} body#layout div.layout-title {color: #204dcc;font-weight: bold;}body#layout #loading {display: none!important;} body#layout #Slide-de-Imagens{height: auto;}

div.style: position: fixed;top: 0;left: 0;z-index: 99999;width: 100vw;height: 100vh;background: var(--fundocarregando);display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;
display: none; margin-top: 2vw; text-align: center; padding: 1.5vw; border: 1px solid #ddd;

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "
